title: Welcome Home to Luxury Living
posting_body: Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability

Offering spacious one and two bedroom floorplans, Feature modern design & innovative community amenities, Our resident clubhouse has a game room & arcade, Fitness Center with Wellbeats virtual fitness, Fido will love the dog park and pet washing station, Relax and regroup in the sauna, Work out the sore muscles in our onsite massage room, Take a splash into the refreshing resort style pool, Meet new friends in the open air community spaces, Check out our bike room and so much more...

Free WiFi Areas, Door to door trash pickup, Carports, Pool, Dog Park, Private detached garages($150/mo), Business center, Sauna, Club house, Fitness center, Outdoor Grills, Electric Car Chargers, Game/Sport room

Premium Countertops, Walk-in showers, Garden/large tubs, Premium Appliances, Ice makers, Ceiling fans, Frost free refrigerators, Walk-in closets, Custom carpet, Custom built-ins, Private patios/balconies, Crown molding, High ceilings, Self-cleaning ovens, Garbage disposals, Microwaves, Dishwashers, Hi-speed internet, W/D machines, Non-carpeted flooring
